attributes.action: Re-run the 1979 general election ,as the result was bad
attributes.additional_details: Industry and manufacturing destroyed ,poverty levels increased with the heavy use of food banks to this day -and if we can re-run the EU referendum,we should start with re-running this democratic procedure because I didn't like the result and feel upset about it.
attributes.background: Many people regret voting for Margaret Thatcher and with the luxury of hindsight would welcome the chance to change their vote

rejection.details: A past general election cannot be re-run.
